1: Allows the player to access a limited-time incubator as well as the auto-incubate feature for 14 days. Tap the information button above to learn more.
2: Increases the capacity of the Egg Box by four. Tap the information button above to learn more.
3: Adds one incubator. Tap the information button above to learn more.
4: Allows the player to access Eggstreme incubators for 14 days. Tap the information button above to learn more.
